summary: The module provides Django test suites that verify the handling of many‑to‑many relationships involving unmanaged models, covering both unmanaged‑to‑unmanaged and unmanaged‑to‑managed scenarios, along with a set of basic unit tests for auxiliary helper functionality.
business_intent: Validate that the ORM correctly creates, queries, and maintains many‑to‑many links when models are marked as unmanaged, ensuring data integrity and preventing runtime errors, while also confirming the correctness of simple helper utilities.
